text: The aroma is full of citrus, grapefruit, wheat, yeast and malt. The color is like a pilsner, somewhat light being a weissbier. The head is fluffy. The taste is full of lemon, grapefruit and wheat. Disappointing.

(bottle) Clear, golden colour with a mid-sized foamy white head. Heavily phenolic aroma with notes of cloves and band aid, mildly wheaty and subtle citric background. Mildly bitter flavour, light to medium bodied with a soft, if not tame carbonation. Moderately wheaty and subtle fruity taste, again with loads of phenolic spices; rather slim and phenolic, mildly wheaty finish. Not convincing. 10.I.17
Clear golden with little white head. Aroma is intensely sweet apple juice with some nutty stuff below. Taste is sour juicy yeast. Finish of some milky sourness. Ok.

(bottle) clear golden colour with a frothy white head. aroma of dandelions and cobwebs, with lots of talcum powder, some floral hops and yeast. flavour is mostly the same, lots of dandelions and talcum powder, with a light yeastiness, some white pepper and a semi-dry finish. medium-bodied with average carbonation.
Bottle. Clear golden color with white head. Aroma is lemon peel, yeasty esters. Taste is spicy, bready. Silky mouthfeel. Not excellent.

Bottle. Golden, low carbonation, white wheat head. Tripel-like spice, grainy mash aroma, lime/lemon notes, somewhat muddled phenolic. Medium light, flat, somewhat sticky grainy, spice, metallic yeast, Yeasty finish. a bit meh.

Pours a deep yellow, perfectly clear (since its filtered). Large rocky loosely packed white head with excellent retention and lots of lacing. Aroma of clove, banana, bubblegum and bread dough. Palate is light body with high carbonation. Flavour is banana-clove yeast character upfront, with bread dough in the middle and a clean finish with very light hop spice and bitterness running through. I prefer the more flavoursome Amber or normal weiss, but this is a very good Krystal.
a very light yellow straw color. well, it smells nice. clean lots of wheat aroma and a yeasty undertone. creamy mouthfeel. sweet wheat, esters, very faint banana, graham cracker, finish is bitter.
RBSG 2016, hotel lobby share. Bottle. Clear medium gold. Light estery wheat. A note of papery/boxboard oxidation in the finish, otherwise not bad.
user_location: the land of bitumen, beef & beer, Alberta, CANADA

text: Bottle - pours yellow white head -nose/taste of wheat, light banana with touch of lemon - med body
Bottle shared. The beer is a pale yellow with a white head. Fruity and yeasty aroma. Sweet taste. Light body and high carbonation.

Bottle, RBSG. Mild sweet wheat aroma, a bit of bubblegum ester and banana. Clear golden with thin white head. Medium body with medium carbonation. Sweet hefeweizen, not a lot of depth. Sweet finish and light yeasty after. Meh.
Bottle at RBSG Lobby Share. Pours a hazy yellow gold with medium frothy white head that lasts. The aroma is lemon and wheat. Medium body, wheat, lemon, light dry finish, decent.
Bottle - Honey and vegetal grains. Pale gold with a small white head. Light pale malts and a clean finish.
Sampled at rbsg. Clear light golden. A big white fluffy head. Clean wheat beer. A bit of lemon and graininess. Light malts. Earth and a little oil. Not bad at all.
Clear yellow color, white edge head. Subtle citrus aroma. Taste is citrus bubblegum and light banana. Tasty summer brew.
Golden klar im Glas, weißer fester Schaum, fruchtig hefig in der Nase, leicht im antrunk, spritzig, leicht fruchtig, erfrischend, nettes Bier

Bottled. A golden beer with a lazing beige head. The aroma has notes of wheat, citrus fruit, and straw. The flavor is sweet with notes of wheat, fruit, and straw, leading to a dry finish. The body is light.

440ml Bottle - Appearance: Clear, golden with a white frothy head.
Aroma: Banana, citrus.
Taste: Malty, banana, citrus. Crisp and refreshing. Medium bitterness.
Mouthfeel: Medium to light body, fizzy carbonation.
Overall: A great summer beer. Very refreshing.

How: Bottle.
Where: Makai, Stockholm.
Appearance: Golden colour with a white head.
Aroma: Caramel, citrus, fruit, some spices, grapefruit.
Body: Medium body and carbonation.
Flavour: Wheat, citrus, floral, some banana.

Rating Based on 440ml Bottle. Light Golden color, almost clear. Strong fizz when opening bottle. Too carbonated, beer was cold but head and large bubbles fizzed to 80% of glass.Strong Clove/Spice aroma and taste, no banana. Label states Lemon and Grapefruit but I didnt note any of that.
Bottle. This is decent weiss with a nice wheat and citrus finish. This is a pretty decent weiss.

Tasted from bottle. Pours a clear gold with thick foamy white head. Aroma is fruity with some yeast and banana. Taste is moderately sweet with yeast, banana, bubblegum, citrus. Overall above the average for style. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Bottle [email protected]/* <![CDATA[ */!function(t,e,r,n,c,a,p){try{t=document.currentScript||function(){for(t=document.getElementsByTagName('script'),e=t.length;e--;)if(t[e].getAttribute('data-cfhash'))return t[e]}();if(t&&(c=t.previousSibling)){p=t.parentNode;if(a=c.getAttribute('data-cfemail')){for(e='',r='0x'+a.substr(0,2)|0,n=2;a.length-n;n+=2)e+='%'+('0'+('0x'+a.substr(n,2)^r).toString(16)).slice(-2);p.replaceChild(document.createTextNode(decodeURIComponent(e)),c)}p.removeChild(t)}}catch(u){}}()/* ]]> */ Beer Festival 2015, (29/05/2015) - yellow pour with white head. Sweet fruity wheaty aroma and taste, some lemony notes, yeasts, pretty watery consistency, pretty basic affair.
Yellow coloured and almost clear. Has a white head, diminishing. Sweet, lightly spicy aroma. Moderate sweet flavor.
Bottle at KØ 15. Clear yellow colour with a white head. Aroma and flavour of yeast, wheat and banana.
DØE. Clear golden with a white head. Aroma is sweet, wheaty, yeasty and light banana. Flavor is medium sweet. Sweet finish. 290515

Bottle 500ml. [ As CBC Krystal Weiss ].Clear medium yellow color with a average, frothy, good lacing, mostly lasting, off-white to white head. Aroma is moderate malty, wheat and wheat, light to moderate yeasty. Flavor is moderate sweet with a average duration, wheat, frtuiy, old yeast. Body is medium, texture is oily to watery, carbonation is soft. [20150529]

Bottle at Ølfestival 2015. 
Clear golden coloured with a small white head.
Fruity aroma of caramel and bananas.
Fruity flavour of caramel, bananas and hops.
Hoppy finish.

Sample at Danske Ölentusiaster Festival 2015. Pale yellow/golden, offwhite head. Malty bready aroma, spicy, caramel, raisins, citrus, some grapes. Malty wheat flavor, citrus, hay, floral notes. A bit unclean.
Bottle. Frothy White good mostly lasting head. Yellow colour. Light malty and hoppy and yeasty aroma. Light bitter flavor. Some fruity esters. Average light bitter finish. Oily palate.
Bottle @ CBC. Clear golden with small white head. Aroma is malt, fruit, wheat, yeast, banana and spices. Flavour is malt, fruit, yeast, banana, medium sweet, clove, hop, spices and a little bitter.
Bottle at KØ15. Bready aroma. Cloudy golden colour. Small stable white head. The flavour is bready with a mild banana note. Not a Kristall, but OK.

Bottle, KØ15. Pours slightly hazy amber with small white head. Clear aroma of malt, with estery, and grainy notes and touches of hops. Sweetish, malty flavour with estery, bananalike and hoppy notes. Mild, sourish touches. Estery aftertaste. Acceptable.
50 cl bottle. Pours hazy yellow with a small white head. Aroma is estery, slight dry. Smooth fruity, crisp. Mild lingering. Smooth fruity finish.
Keg at Queens Head, Stockholm.  Clear pale golden, small head. Banana aroma. Sweet with medium body and clean, rounded mouthfeel. Sugar, dough and banana. No bitterness.
A straight forward crystal weiss with no suprises. Does the job though, which is all you can ask for
440ml flaska. Köpt av svågern i Sydafrika. Mycket trevlig fär. Doft av bananer och koriander, men tyvärr lite tunn.
Bought at Knysna Spar. Classic Weiss with lovely mouthfeel. Could have a bit more yeast on nose but very drinkable.
500 ml bottle at Ultuna studenkår. Clear golden with huge white head. Aroma of grain, wheat, malt and caramel. Taste is similar, caramel is most dominant.

On tap at Anti-establisment, Braamfontein, Johannesburg. Again a fantastically complex and nice beer from CBC! Although taste is a bit on the sweet side (but not far too much!), the mellow wheaty-ness had a clear umami feel to it making the mouthfeel incredible. Some fruit -- raisin, citrus. Nice head. A very, very nice brew.
on holiday in Namibia 440ml bottle of gold blond colored sparkling body with a big white head and a spicy yeast hops aroma a spicy hop fruity sweet taste with a bitter finish
Flaska på Mr P, fint utseende, men tunn smak och liten men ren doft. Överlag en ganska enkel men tråkig kristall

A pure gold beer with a fine creamy head that dissipates quickly. Big yeasty cloves and a broad malt aroma. Some straw-like hops. Thin palate and overly carbonated (forced?). Ginger and watermelon in the mouth, with a touch of honey. The yeast is a constant through to the finish. Shows a bit more of the malt as it warms. Finishes with some sweat peach flavours. Much less impressive and enjoyable than their Amber Weiss - so a bit pointless in my mind. That said, its a well made pointless beer.

Very nice clear golden with small white head. Aroma is Banana, malt, light caramel, light citrus and yeast. medium round mouth feel with full carbonation. Aftertaste is banana, sweet malt, yeast, and some floral hop bitterness. Overall: Impressive. Well brewed. Bad head retention.

Aroma: Lemon is initially stong, but mellows out quickly, dough, hay, banana, corriander
Appearance: Clear gold body. Large, foamy, long lasting white head.
Taste: Sweet grain, bread, light bitterness, banana, coriander
Palate: Creamy, medium high carbonation, medium light
Overall: WOW! I like this!!! The taste is awesome! I need a case of this, NOW!


440 ml bottle, poured.

UPDATED: JUN 28, 2013 A very carbonated beer.  Much different than any Weiss Ive ever tasted.  The aroma is very fruity.  The beer is very light in the mouth with flavors of lemons, grapefruit, and litchi.  Would be very refreshing on a hot summer day.
